thread.title: Video of LL7K's songs receiving accolades
thread.title_full: Video of LL7K's songs receiving accolades - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Video of LL7K's songs receiving accolades
text:
The videos of the two songs from Anil Radhakrishnan Menon's movie 'Lord Livingstone 7000 Kandi' that was released in YouTube recently is being appreciated by Malayalis.
Dheera Charitham written by Engadiyoor Chandrashekaran is sung by Job Kurien and Tharangal Padunne is crooned by Rex Vijayan.
Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
